display.title: Alloy Smelter
display.description:
The Alloy Smelter uses power to both smelt items and to create alloys like Dark Steel. The Alloy Smelter has three input slots and one output slot.

It has a "Furnace Mode" button in the bottom-right corner with three different options:

- Furnace Only: the Alloy Smelter will only smelt Furnace recipes.
- Alloys Only: the Alloy Smelter will only create alloys.
- All Smelting: the Alloy Smelter will both smelt Furnace recipes and create alloys.

By default, the machine is capable of producing alloys from some other mods as well as Ender IO alloys.
